subject: Problem with the pedal
description_text: Buy the set from amazon, and they said that i should send a video here

conversations.body_text:
So i tried to follow you instructions as best as i could, but i must say
that it didn’t help. That’s why i want you to ask to make a refund

On Sat 30. Aug 2025 at 07:38, support@simsonn.com

Hi Boris _,    The hydraulic rod is not a cheap gas spring, so it is normal to hear liquid flow sounds. As for the clicking sound you mentioned, please try removing the hydraulic rod to check if the sound persists:    If the sound is still present, please send me a video so I can help further diagnose the issue;    If the hydraulic rod is confirmed to be faulty, we will provide a new replacement free of charge.
